channel.title: Faster Restoring Special
channel.description: So um, my special attack restores at about 10% a minute lol. How can i speed that up to say... 100% special in 1 minute??

item.title: Faster Restoring Special
item.dc:creator: @_SITTION |SITTION|
item.description:
@_SITTION wrote:

bluefire7913:

Well. If its a 317 just go to chara. then look for your name. Then clicky! then look for spec.or just click find…Then spec. then just put 999999 or what ever spec u want. If that’s not what you looking for then good luck

If u dont know what he talking, then dont talk shit bro

ontopic; Its somewhere in CLient.java. or in player.java Id knowed it runed a server, bout 3 years ago Stopped rsps only on forums now. If i got it wrong sorry;)

Read full topic
